verbs.description: President Trump [V: may] invite North Korean President Kim Jong Un to Mar - a - Lago if their summit in Singapore goes well , according to a U.S. official . Trump has hosted two other world leaders his private club : Chinese President Xi Jinping and Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe .

[ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: invite] [ARG1: North Korean President Kim Jong Un] [ARG2: to Mar - a - Lago] [ARGM-ADV: if their summit in Singapore goes well] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a U.S. official] . Trump has hosted two other world leaders his private club : Chinese President Xi Jinping and Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe .

President Trump may invite North Korean President Kim Jong Un to Mar - a - Lago if [ARG1: their summit in Singapore] [V: goes] [ARGM-MNR: well] , according to a U.S. official . Trump has hosted two other world leaders his private club : Chinese President Xi Jinping and Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe .
